summary: Emmanuelle is sent to Bangkok on a journalism assignment. While there, she embarks on her own exploration of the secrets of sensual pleasure. While learning much, she also reveals several secrets of her own.
cast: Laura Gemser|Gabriele Tinti|Ely Galleani|Ivan Rassimov|Venantino Venantini|Giacomo Rossi Stuart|Koike Mahoco|Fausto Di Bella|Gaby Bourgois|Chris Avram|Attilio Duse|Debra Berger|Giuseppe Marrocco|Anna Maria Perego|Lanfranco Spinola|Sandra Wolff
title: Emanuelle negra se va a oriente
